Text:
by the way, forgot to mention, this does not contain the in-game radio music, just use your own mp3s by dropping them into the 'User Tracks' folder

also, this does not work on Windows 7 x64
of course it does. I wouldn't have uploaded it if it didn't.

when i extracted the _unpak.bat and finished 


a C:/ window appeares

that says:
OK, alldone. Enjoy another Fine TECHNIC realease !!

Press any key to continue...

and i press any key but the window close and nothing appears

the game exe doesnt appears

Help me please!
